about_the_game:
In The Overseer: Field Trials, your observation, memory, and reaction skills will be put to the test. It's an atmospheric walking simulator in which you have to remember the default area setup and report whether an anomaly has occurred in subsequent loops. Report correctly several times to win, but make a mistake and your progress resets. Most anomalies are harmless reality distortions, but some entities may break through into our world—if they do, you'll need to run. Just don't forget to report in the chaos.

The Demo offers a limited experience on a first map.

Play Time

30-60 minutes

Key Features

  • 16 anomalies (50+ in full game)

  • Unique reporting system

  • Modern graphics and lighting, in full color

Technical Info

The game offers detailed audio settings with separate categories for different sound sources. All in-game music is copyright-free.

There are no head bob, lens distortion, chromatic aberration, or heavy screen filters.

Developed with Unreal Engine 5, with special care put towards lower-end devices to reach a broader audience.

Feel free to contact me using the links in the panel on the right.

short_description: Step into the role of a paranormal agent. It's time for field trials where you’ll identify anomalies firsthand. The trials are held in a partially controlled environment, but stay alert—unexpected threats may arise. Successfully report anomalies multiple times to earn your Field Agent badge.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
